Giuliani most recently stirred controversy after telling Fox News that he helped Trump draft his executive order on immigration, which bans most travel from seven majority-Muslim countries, after Trump asked him how to implement a "Muslim ban" "legally."
Rudy Giuliani openly lobbied to be Trump's secretary of state, but said that he withdrew himself from consideration for the position on November 29.
